name.en: Layer 19: "Preventing the Invasion! The Pitch-Black Super Quantum!!"
name.ja: <ruby>第<rt>だい</rt></ruby>１９<ruby>層<rt>レイヤー</rt></ruby>『<ruby>襲<rt>しゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>来<rt>らい</rt></ruby><ruby>干<rt>かん</rt></ruby><ruby>渉<rt>しょう</rt></ruby>！<ruby>漆<rt>しっ</rt></ruby><ruby>黒<rt>こく</rt></ruby>の<ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>量<rt>りょう</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>！！』
name.ja_romaji: Daijūkyū Reiyā "Shūrai Kanshō! Shikkoku no Chōryōshi!!"

text.en:
Activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of "Layer 19: "Preventing the Invasion! The Pitch-Black Super Quantum!!"" once per turn);
● Target 1 Attack Position monster; change it to Defense Position.
● If you control a "Super Quant" monster: Special Summon 1 "Super Quant" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, with a different original Attribute from the monsters you control.
● Set 1 "Super Quant" Trap from your Deck. It can be activated this turn.
